name: Monster Ultra White
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with a light, refreshing citrus flavor. Sugar-free, low calorie, with the classic Monster Energy blend. Smooth and refreshing - ideal for a sugar-free energy boost.

name: Monster Ultra Black
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with a subtle dark fruit taste - soft cola/cherry-like flavor with the classic Monster Energy blend. Crisp, fruity, and refreshing.

name: Monster Ultra Peachy Keen
description: Carbonated energy drink with peach flavor, 0g sugar, Monster’s signature blend with taurine, ginseng, caffeine, L-carnitine and B-vitamins. Refreshing, fruity, and low calorie.

name: Monster Ultra Watermelon
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with a refreshing watermelon flavor - juicy, fruity, and smooth, with the classic Monster Energy blend for a light, fruity energy boost.

name: Monster Ultra Golden Pineapple
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with tropical pineapple inspiration: airy, fruity, and exotic - perfect for fans of tropical flavors wanting sugar-free energy.

name: Monster Ultra Sunrise
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with fresh citrus/orange flavor - light, sparkling, and refreshing. Perfect for a morning or daytime pick-me-up with the classic Monster Energy blend.

name: Monster Ultra Rosa
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with a light, sweet, and fruity flavor - soft, bright berry notes. Refreshing and easily drinkable energy boost without extra sugar.

name: Monster Ultra Red
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with fruit punch / mixed berry flavor - slightly sweeter fruit-forward energy option with Monster blend.

name: Monster Ultra Blue
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with berry/citrus-inspired flavor - juicy berries combined with a light, fresh finish. Full Monster Energy blend, but lighter and fruity.

name: Monster Ultra Strawberry Dreams
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with strawberry flavor - fruity, lightly sweet, and refreshing, combined with Monster’s energy mix. Perfect for fans of sweeter fruit flavors without sugar.

name: Monster Ultra Fantasy Ruby Red
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with a fresh grapefruit/ruby-red citrus taste - crisp, lightly bitter, but refreshing with the Monster energy boost.

name: Monster Ultra Paradise
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with tropical flavor: kiwi, lime, and a hint of cucumber - fruity, exotic, and refreshing with the classic Monster Energy blend.

name: Monster Ultra Fiesta
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with tropical fruit profile - fruity, festive, and tropical. Great for those who enjoy exotic energy drinks without sugar.

name: Monster Ultra Vice Guava
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with guava/tropical fruit flavor - exotic and fruity, with the classic Monster Energy mix. Perfect for juice-like, calorie-free energy.

name: Monster Ultra Blue Hawaiian
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with tropical cocktail-inspired flavor - fruity, exotic, and refreshing, perfect for fans of tropical fruit-style energy boosts without sugar.

name: Monster Ultra Violet
description: Zero-Sugar Ultra with grape flavor - light, fruity, sugar-free energy variant with the classic Monster blend; crisp and fruity, perfect for variety.

name: Monster Energy Super-Premium Import
description: The original Monster - classic energy drink with iconic flavor, caffeine, taurine, and vitamins. The legendary Monster Energy boost.

name: Monster Energy Zero Sugar
description: Sugar-free version of the original - less sweet, same powerful Monster Energy blend for energy without added sugars.

name: Monster Energy Nitro Super Dry
description: Super-dry twist on the classic Monster, infused with nitrous oxide for a uniquely smooth texture and explosive energy power.

name: Monster Energy Nitro Cosmic Peach
description: Cosmic-inspired energy drink with a juicy peach flavor - smooth, lightly carbonated, and packed with Monster’s signature energy blend for a bold, out-of-this-world boost.

name: Monster Energy Reserve White Pineapple
description: Premium Reserve line with bright white-pineapple flavor - crisp, tropical, and refined, with the full Monster Energy kick.

name: Monster Energy Reserve Orange Dreamsicle
description: Inspired by the classic creamsicle - smooth orange and creamy vanilla collide for a nostalgic, high-energy treat.

name: Monster Energy Reserve Peaches n’ Crème
description: Smooth, creamy peach flavor from the Reserve line - sweet, silky, and delicious with the full Monster Energy kick.

name: Monster Energy Lo-Carb
description: Lower carbs, same big Monster Energy blend - lighter in flavor but just as powerful.

name: Monster Energy Original Green “OG”
description: The original green Monster - sweet, salty, and citrusy with a bold energy punch. The one that started it all.

name: Monster Energy Electric Blue
description: Bright, electric blue flavor with a refreshing bite and the legendary Monster Energy blend for pure charge.

name: Monster Energy Orange Dreamsicle
description: Creamy orange flavor from the Original/Reserve family - nostalgic and full-bodied, blended with classic Monster energy.

name: Java Monster Mean Bean
description: Coffee + energy: smooth roasted coffee flavor combined with Monster’s signature energy blend for long-lasting focus and energy. Perfect for coffee and energy lovers.

name: Java Monster Loca Moca
description: Rich mocha coffee flavor combined with Monster’s powerful energy blend - bold, indulgent, and energizing.

name: Java Monster Salted Caramel
description: Sweet and salty caramel coffee flavor with real coffee - indulgent, creamy, and packed with Monster Energy.

name: Java Monster Irish Crème
description: Rich coffee blend with smooth Irish crème flavor - mellow, creamy, and fully charged with Monster power.

name: Java Monster Café Latte
description: Classic café latte taste in a can - smooth coffee and milk combined with the Monster Energy blend.

name: Killer Brew Loca Moca
description: Strong coffee flavor with mocha tones and an intense energy boost - part of the Killer Brew lineup.

name: Killer Brew Mean Bean
description: Bold, dark coffee taste with extra energy - straightforward and powerful, built for hard workers.

name: Java Monster 300 Mocha
description: Compact 300ml can with a rich mocha flavor and a concentrated hit of Monster energy - perfect for on-the-go energy.

name: Java Monster 300 French Vanilla
description: Creamy French vanilla coffee flavor in a 300ml size - sweet, smooth, and packed with energy for the road.

name: Juice Monster Mango Loco
description: Tropical mango juice mix with Monster energy - fruity, juicy, and powerful, with a tropical vibe.

name: Juice Monster Bad Apple
description: Crisp apple juice taste with Monster Energy power - juicy, refreshing, and smooth.

name: Juice Monster Viking Berry
description: Bold berry flavor inspired by the north - rich fruit notes with full Monster Energy charge.

name: Juice Monster Rio Punch
description: Tropical punch bursting with fruit flavor and the signature Monster Energy blend - pure island energy.

name: Juice Monster Pacific Punch
description: Sun-kissed punch flavor packed with tropical fruits and the smooth energy of Monster.

name: Juice Monster Mixxd Punch
description: A tropical fruit punch explosion with real juice and Monster Energy’s legendary blend for a smooth, powerful kick.

name: Juice Monster Pipeline Punch
description: A legendary blend of passion fruit, orange, and guava - sweet, tropical, and endlessly drinkable.

name: Juice Monster Monarch
description: Light, subtle flavor with hints of peach and nectarine. Juiced Monster delivers full fruit flavors with 160 mg of caffeine.

name: Juice Monster Khaotic
description: A re-imagined classic - bold tropical flavor, real juice, and smooth Monster Energy power.

name: Juice Monster Ripper
description: Combines tropical fruit juices with the powerful Monster Energy blend - smooth, juicy, and refreshing with a tropical twist.

name: Juice Monster Aussie Lemonade
description: A refreshing Australian-style lemonade with a light citrus bite and smooth Monster Energy blend - tangy, crisp, and perfectly balanced.

name: Juice Monster Khaos
description: Khaos, an insane Juice-Monster hybrid bubbling with the great Monster taste and the big bad buzz you know and love.

name: Rehab Monster Tea Lemonade
description: Non-carbonated tea + lemonade combo - refreshing, hydrating, and packed with Monster Energy to keep you going.

name: Rehab Monster Green Tea
description: Lightly brewed green tea flavor with a hint of sweetness - smooth, clean, and non-carbonated Monster Energy.

name: Rehab Monster Strawberry Lemonade
description: Sweet strawberry meets tart lemonade - tea-style energy that’s fruity, refreshing, and sugar-free.

name: Rehab Monster Peach Tea
description: Classic peach tea taste - light, refreshing, and powered by Monster’s signature non-carbonated blend.

name: Rehab Monster Wild Berry
description: A smooth mix of wild berries blended with tea - crisp, flavorful, and packed with the Monster Energy kick.

name: Monster Full Throttle
description: Carbonated energy drink with taurine, caffeine, L-carnitine and B vitamins with sweeteners. Flavor profile: peach and nectarine.

name: Monster Lando Norris
description: Limited edition collaboration with F1 driver Lando Norris - light, fruity flavor with the classic Monster Energy blend and racing-inspired design.

name: Monster The Doctor
description: 500 ml carbonated energy drink with 160 mg caffeine. Light, crisp and refreshing citrus taste. Created in collaboration with MotoGP Champion Valentino Rossi.

name: Monster The Doctor Zero Sugar
description: Zero sugar version of The Doctor - light, crispy, refreshing citrus taste with the full dose of our legendary Monster Energy mix.

name: Monster Energy Assault
description: Monster Energy Assault 500ml can, great tasting, refreshing energy drink with energy blend, 160mg caffeine.
